name: Pancakes
description: Soft and fluffy pancakes, perfect for a delicious breakfast.

instructions.text: Melt the butter in a saucepan over low heat or in the microwave.
Put the flour, baking powder, and sugar in a mixing bowl. Mix and make a well.
Add the whole eggs and whisk everything together.
Gradually incorporate the melted butter and milk, continuing to mix to avoid lumps.
Let the batter rest for 30 minutes at room temperature.
In a hot, lightly oiled pan, pour a ladle of batter and cook until bubbles form on the surface. Flip and cook the other side until golden.
Repeat until all the batter is used. Serve hot with the toppings of your choice.

tips: For even fluffier pancakes, you can add a little plain yoghurt to the batter.
Using a pancake pan makes cooking easier and helps achieve evenly shaped pancakes.
You can store cooked pancakes in an airtight container in the refrigerator for 2 days. Reheat slightly before serving.
